attributes.action: Stop Donald Trump being banned from the United kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
We are all aware of the current petition to ban Trump from the UK but  if we examine his view of our special relationship you will see its in both countries interests for the state visit to happen .

* Supports US-UK trade deal
*Wants NATO nations to pay there way (whilst we pay £60 million and the Americans £650 million ,France and Germany fall short of the mark at £40 million each)
*Whilst the EU tries to punish Britain with a bad deal we need to work with other countries not exclude ourselves
attributes.background: Action needs to be taken to stop Donald Trump being banned from the uk as one of the only foreign leaders willing to support a post Brexit Britain . Not only was he democratically elected and  his domestic policies  being an american issue not a British one . .
